.. data:: ENV_NAME_1
   :annotation: = RestorationDisEnv-v0

   :annotation: = 500

   :annotation: = 500

   :annotation: = 2

   

.. data:: MIN_DISTURBANCE
   :annotation: = 2

   

.. class:: DictList


   Bases: :py:obj:`dict`

   dict() -> new empty dictionary
   dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's
       (key, value) pairs
   dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via:
       d = {}
       for k, v in iterable:
           d[k] = v
   dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs
       in the keyword argument list.  For example:  dict(one=1, two=2)

   .. method:: __setitem__(self, key, value)

      Set self[key] to value.



.. function:: logger_obj(logger_name, level=logging.DEBUG, verbose=0)

   Method to return a custom logger with the given name and level


.. class:: Agent(env, output_path, log_level=logging.DEBUG)


   .. method:: get_expert_policy(self, env, s0)

      get the expert policy by solving the full-period restoration problem


   .. method:: load_profile(self, env, load_status)


   .. method:: convert_tieline_action(self, s1_tieline, s0_tieline)

      :param s1_tieline: current tieline status
      :param s0_tieline: previsou tieline status
      :return: integer action from 0 to 5


   .. method:: policy_hybrid(self, env, s_high, s_low, mode)


   .. method:: find_float_key(self, dict, near_key)


   .. method:: run_train(self, env, s0)


   .. method:: run_test(self, env, s0)
